entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
